mapper.select: select DATE_FORMAT(treatment_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as treatment_date, treatment.treatment_id, treatment.staff_id, staff.staff_name, diagnose.disease_code, disease.disease_name from treatment, staff, diagnose, disease where treatment.staff_id = staff.staff_id and treatment.treatment_id = diagnose.treatment_id and diagnose.disease_code = disease.disease_code and patient_id = #{patient_id}
